_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: 原版 Minecraft
author: support@pterodactyl.io
description: 我的世界 原版预设

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# Vanilla MC Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

# wget

LATEST_VERSION=`curl https://bmclapi2.bangbang93.com/mc/game/version_manifest.json | jq -r '.latest.release'`
LATEST_SNAPSHOT_VERSION=`curl https://bmclapi2.bangbang93.com/mc/game/version_manifest.json | jq -r '.latest.snapshot'`

echo -e "latest version is $LATEST_VERSION"
echo -e "latest snapshot is $LATEST_SNAPSHOT_VERSION"

if [ -z "$VANILLA_VERSION" ] || [ "$VANILLA_VERSION" == "latest" ]; then
  MANIFEST_URL=$(curl -sSL https://bmclapi2.bangbang93.com/mc/game/version_manifest.json | jq --arg VERSION $LATEST_VERSION -r '.versions | .[] | select(.id== $VERSION )|.url')
elif [ "$VANILLA_VERSION" == "snapshot" ]; then
  MANIFEST_URL=$(curl -sSL https://bmclapi2.bangbang93.com/mc/game/version_manifest.json | jq --arg VERSION $LATEST_SNAPSHOT_VERSION -r '.versions | .[] | select(.id== $VERSION )|.url')
else
  MANIFEST_URL=$(curl -sSL https://bmclapi2.bangbang93.com/mc/game/version_manifest.json | jq --arg VERSION $VANILLA_VERSION -r '.versions | .[] | select(.id== $VERSION )|.url')
fi

DOWNLOAD_URL=$(curl ${MANIFEST_URL} | jq .downloads.server | jq -r '. | .url')
# 替换下载地址为bmclapi2.bangbang93.com
DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo $DOWNLOAD_URL | sed 's/launcher.mojang.com/bmclapi2.bangbang93.com/')

echo -e "running: wget -O ${SERVER_JARFILE} $DOWNLOAD_URL"
# curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} $DOWNLOAD_URL
wget -O ${SERVER_JARFILE} $DOWNLOAD_URL

echo -e "Install Complete"

variables.name: 服务器 Jar 文件
variables.description: 将要使用的 Jar 文件，您可以自定义。

variables.name: 服务器版本
variables.description: 要安装的 Minecraft 版本。使用“latest”安装最新版本，或使用“snapshot”安装最新快照。转到“设置”>“重新安装服务器”以应用。
